short_summary: The Department of Natural Resources seeks a contractor to supply and install a soundproof curtain at a facility in the National Capital Area.
description: See the full description of the tender notice below.
full_summary:
# Sound Proof Curtain Tender Announcement

## Mandatory Information

* **Contract Title:** Sound Proof Curtain
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (Categorie : Marchandises et Services)
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3526667328 (numéro de la demande de soumission)
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2022, at 14:00 EST (date limite de clôture de l'appel d'offres)

## Request For Bids

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is soliciting bids from qualified contractors to supply, deliver, and install a sound proof curtain at a CanmetENERGY facility in the National Capital Area. This contract is a result of an expired bid solicitation (WS3526667328-Doc3561236404) with a closing date of October 31, 2022.

## Contract Requirements

* **Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria:**
	+ The bidder must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation.
	+ The bidder must meet the mandatory technical evaluation criteria.
* **Security Requirements:** There are no security requirements applicable to this contract.

## Tenders

This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation (WS3526667328-Doc3561236404). A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.

## Delivery Schedule

The contractor must deliver and install the sound proof curtain within four weeks of contract award.

## Notice URL

* The bid solicitation documents can be downloaded from [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14399052?extsite=MTQzOTkwNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14399052?extsite=MTQzOTkwNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Procurement Context**
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The procurement category is "Goods and Services" (Categorie : Marchandises et Services).
